title: Lift - means an appliance designed to transport persons or materials between two or more levels in vertical or substantially vertical directions, by means of a guided car platform
clause_text: Lift - means an appliance designed to transport persons or materials between two or more levels in vertical or substantially vertical directions, by means of a guided car platform.
